mapper.select: SELECT std_id, tch_id, saving_id, rate, deposit_amount, start_date, end_date, total_amount FROM Saving_account WHERE std_id = #{stdId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Saving_account (std_id,tch_id, saving_id, rate, deposit_amount, start_date, end_date, total_amount) VALUES (#{stdId},#{tchId}, #{savingId}, #{rate}, #{depositAmount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalAmount})

INSERT INTO Saving (product, rate, saving_content, target, deposit_period, deposit_cycle, max_deposit, prime_rate, prime_job) VALUES (#{product}, #{rate}, #{savingContent}, #{target}, #{depositPeriod}, #{depositCycle}, #{maxDeposit}, #{primeRate}, #{primeJob})
